long_description: The ultralight, 3-season Sierra Designs Flash 2UL Tent offers an awning and drop doors for protection from the elements, and open-air living space for cooking and outdoor views in poor weather. Convenient freestanding design pitches anywhere, no matter how impenetrable the surface. Sierra Designs Flash 2 UL Tent features a hybrid double/single wall design that reduces weight and allows quick and dry setup, even in the rain. High ceiling creates plenty of headroom, even when you're using a thick mattress; symmetrical floor space accommodates both head-to-head and head-to-foot sleep configurations. Generous interior space lets 2 occupants sit at either end of the tent with extra room in between for dinner or a comfortable game of cards. Both doors are large enough for 2 people to sit side by side; 15-in. awnings offer shade and move drip lines away from the doors. Dual gear closets store your gear where it should be-away from the doors; whether zipped closed or open for ventilation, closets help keep contents dry in a rainstorm.
